translation.zh: 先讲一个最有血有泪的故事

translation.zh: 那个年代 我们还在使用35毫米卷轴

translation.zh: 一部电影的胶片 需要用上两个几十公斤的卷轴

translation.en: [narrator] And with this kind of strength, it didn't take Irwin long to lift himself
translation.zh: 凭借着这股毅力 欧文很快就把自己推向另一个高度

translation.zh: 他不再从事搬运活 而是擢升为院线预定员

translation.zh: 后来得到上司的青睐 他们给我机会任职院线预定员

translation.zh: 院线预定员主要负责预定胶卷 然后送到各大院线上映

translation.en: It was logistical more than anything else.
translation.zh: 基本上就是物流活

translation.zh: 毕竟电影业行情不太好

translation.zh: 人们都问我： “为什么要从事电影业？

translation.en: I was astonished. This is an incredibly good movie.
translation.zh: 我感到很惊讶 那是一部上好的电影

translation.en: I said, "Amazing that no studio is willing to take a chance on this picture,
translation.zh: 我说：“我很惊讶没有片商愿意 给这部电影机会

translation.en: let alone this young man."
translation.zh: 愿意给这个年轻人机会”

translation.en: [narrator] And so, Irwin took a chance on both.
translation.zh: 于是欧文决定给这两者机会

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: I said, "Fellas, I think your movie is brilliant,
translation.zh: 我说：“各位 你们的电影非常出色

translation.en: -and I'd like to distribute it." -I'll kill you if this is a joke.
translation.zh: 我愿意发行” 如果这是恶作剧 我就杀了你

translation.en: [narrator] It was no joke.
translation.zh: 这可不是恶作剧

translation.en: I know how to distribute a movie. I'm a one-stop Warner Bros. [laughs]
translation.zh: 发行电影方面我是内行人 我就是一站式的华纳兄弟影业

translation.en: [narrator] And so, Irwin's one-stop studio started.
translation.zh: 于是欧文建立了一家一站式影业公司

translation.en: I said, "I wanna change the title."
translation.zh: 我说：“首先 我要换个片名”

translation.en: [announcer] Assault on Precinct 13.
translation.zh: 《血溅13号警署》

translation.en: I made the trailer.
translation.zh: 预告片是我剪的

translation.en: -I designed the poster. -[narrator] And most importantly…
translation.zh: 海报是我设计的 最重要的是…

translation.en: I had a relationship with the exhibitors, so I was able to call in old favors,
translation.zh: 我认识所有的放映商 能动用一些人情牌

translation.en: and I got the picture distributed.
translation.zh: 于是电影成功发行了

translation.en: Right. Bye.
translation.zh: 好的 再见

translation.en: [narrator] And finally, John Carpenter would have an audience.
translation.zh: 约翰卡朋特终于有了观众

translation.en: Assault came out, and…
translation.zh: 《血溅13号警署》上映后…

translation.en: No. Sorry.
translation.zh: 不行 抱歉

translation.en: …didn't do anything much.
translation.zh: …票房普通

translation.en: [narrator] That is, until…
translation.zh: 但那是在…

translation.en: Until it went to England.
translation.zh: 电影进军英国之前

translation.en: [narrator] Because Irwin received another important phone call.
translation.zh: 因为欧文接到另一通关键性的电话

translation.en: And I answered the phone. "Irwin Yablans?" "Yes."
translation.zh: 我拿起电话 “你是欧文雅布兰斯吗？” “我是”

translation.en: "My name is Michael Myers."
translation.zh: 他说：“我叫麦克梅尔斯”

translation.en: "And I'd like to enter your film in the London Film Festival."
translation.zh: “我想替你的电影 报名参加伦敦电影节”

translation.en: He got my attention.
translation.zh: 他引起了我的注意

translation.en: Someone in the central office wanted to give you something special.
translation.zh: 总部要给你一个特别的任务

translation.en: He did indeed enter it into the London Film Festival.
translation.zh: 他确实把电影带入伦敦电影节

translation.en: It won the first prize.
translation.zh: 还斩获了头奖

translation.en: Suddenly, it's the darling of UK-London cinema.
translation.zh: 突然之间 这部电影成了英国伦敦电影院的宠儿

translation.en: That sure got around fast.
translation.zh: 消息果然一下子就传开来了

translation.en: Inexplicably, it was a hit in England.
translation.zh: 电影莫名其妙地在英国爆红

translation.en: People just went wild for it.
translation.zh: 人人趋之若鹜

translation.en: And I think that had some echo effect back here in the States.
translation.zh: 在美国也引起了一阵回响

translation.en: [narrator] But, as with all echoes, they fade.
translation.zh: 但就像所有回响一样 都会转淡

translation.en: And so, with a degree of urgency, Irwin thought…
translation.zh: 在某种迫切的需要下 欧文心想…

translation.en: I gotta find something for-- To make with John Carpenter.
translation.zh: 我必须整点事跟约翰卡朋特一起做

translation.en: [narrator] And immediately began bouncing ideas around in his head.
translation.zh: 他的脑海马上闪现许多点子

translation.en: I'm racking my brain. "What can we do? What kind of movie can we make?"
translation.zh: 我左思右想 我们能做什么？ 我们能拍什么电影？

translation.en: And out of nowhere, I thought, "Why not make a movie about babysitters
translation.zh: 突然之间 我想到：“不如拍一部

translation.en: being terrorized in a single night?"
translation.zh: 讲述保姆一夜惊魂的电影？”

translation.en: Hey, now that's wonderful.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: [narrator] But not just any old night.
translation.zh: 但不是任何一个夜晚

translation.en: "Why not make it on the scariest night of the year?"
translation.zh: 何不把时间点 设在每年最恐怖的夜晚？

translation.en: [narrator] And he's not talking about Valentine's Day.
translation.zh: 他所指的不是情人节

translation.en: Halloween.
translation.zh: 万圣节

translation.en: -Diane was in bed, my wife. -[narrator] He woke her up.
translation.zh: 当时我太太戴安还在睡觉 他把太太叫醒

translation.en: [Yablans] I told her the story. She said, "Sensational."
translation.zh: 我把故事告诉了她 她听了说：“厉害”

translation.en: Cute, Bob. Real cute.
translation.zh: 鲍柏 真可爱

translation.en: "Call John right now." And I did. I got him on the phone at night.
translation.zh: 她说：“赶紧给约翰打电话吧” 于是我那晚就给他打了电话

translation.en: I said, "Can you meet me tomorrow?" I told him the story. He got it instantly.
translation.zh: 我问：“你明天能过来一趟吗？” 我把故事告诉他 他马上就同意

translation.en: [narrator] And when they all went back to bed, they could rest easy
translation.zh: 他们回到各自的床上后 终于迎来一夜好眠

translation.en: knowing that Irwin Yablans
translation.zh: 因为他们知道欧文雅布兰斯

translation.en: had just created the movie that we'd all come to know as…
translation.zh: 刚创造了一部电影 这部电影就是我们后来熟悉的…

translation.en: The Babysitter Murders. Okay, fine.
translation.zh: 《保姆杀手》 别闹了

translation.en: [narrator] And with this simple idea…
translation.zh: 有了这个简单的想法…

translation.en: A horror film set on Halloween,
translation.zh: 拍一部以万圣节为主题的电影 叫《月光光心慌慌》

translation.en: -called Halloween. -So, not The Babysitter Murders?
translation.zh: 拍一部以万圣节为主题的电影 叫《月光光心慌慌》 等等 不是叫《保姆杀手》吗？

translation.en: No, none of that's true. There was no such thing as Babysitter Murders ever.
translation.zh: 一派胡言 《保姆杀手》这个片名从没出现过

translation.en: Well, that's not what the internet says, so…
translation.zh: 但网络不是这么说的

translation.en: No. Remember, I'm the sole source, because it came right from here.
translation.zh: 别忘了 我是唯一的发起人 毕竟点子是我出的

translation.en: That's the idea.
translation.zh: 我就是这么想的

translation.en: [narrator] But Irwin's magnificent idea was a horror,
translation.zh: 欧文的大点子是要拍一部恐怖片

translation.en: which is funny to think, at the time, John Carpenter wasn't known for.
translation.zh: 回想起来挺有趣的 毕竟约翰卡朋特 当时不是以拍恐怖片而闻名

translation.en: I enjoy suspense
translation.zh: 我喜欢悬疑片

translation.en: and action and thrills.
translation.zh: 动作片和惊悚片

translation.en: And I enjoy comedy. I guess, mainly, the genres.
translation.zh: 我也喜欢喜剧 这些都是我喜欢的主要片种

translation.en: [narrator] Exactly. Carpenter had no interest in making your average 1970s horror movie.
translation.zh: 没错 卡朋特对拍摄 典型的七十年代恐怖片不感兴趣

translation.en: You know the ones.
translation.zh: 你懂的 就是这些…

translation.en: God is dead!
translation.zh: 上帝已死！

translation.en: -[woman] Hail Satan! -Satan lives!
translation.zh: -撒旦万岁！ -撒旦万岁！

translation.en: [narrator] And as it happened, Irwin saw Halloween differently, too.
translation.zh: 好在欧文对《月光光心慌慌》 也有不同的想法

translation.en: -Ma'am? -[teacher] Answer the question.
translation.zh: -这位女士？ -回答问题

translation.en: [narrator] A vision he laid out to John Carpenter at lunch.
translation.zh: 他在午餐时把想法告诉了约翰卡朋特

translation.en: I remember I had a tuna fish sandwich.
translation.zh: 我记得当时点了吞拿鱼三明治

translation.en: And I said, "John." I said, "I'm the last of the radio generation."
translation.zh: 我跟约翰说： “我是最后一代广播节目的听众”

translation.en: When I was a kid, I would listen to Inner Sanctum and Lights Out,
translation.zh: 我小时候会定时收听 《密室深处》和《关灯后》

translation.en: radio horror shows.
translation.zh: 这些恐怖广播节目

translation.en: And I wanna tell you, I would get under the covers with the radio,
translation.zh: 给我听好 我会把自己和收音机裹在被子下

translation.en: and nothing you could possibly see on a screen
translation.zh: 你们从屏幕上看到的画面

translation.en: could match what I would conjure up in my mind.
translation.zh: 都及不上浮现在我脑海里的画面

translation.en: And I want this movie to play like that. Theater of the mind.
translation.zh: 我希望这部电影有这种效果 是一部激发想象力的电影

translation.en: [narrator] Which meant less of this.
translation.zh: 这也意味着这种场面较少

translation.en: "I don't want a lot of blood. I don't want gore."
translation.zh: 我不要大量的血腥和暴力场面

translation.en: [narrator] And more of this.
translation.zh: 更多这种场面

translation.en: [Yablans] I want the audience to be frightened, not repulsed.
translation.zh: 我要观众受到惊吓 而不是感到排斥

translation.en: Drag their eyes to the right and scare them on the left.
translation.zh: 让观众把焦点转向右边 惊吓元素却在左边出现

translation.en: [narrator] But hang on. How would the director take this direction?
translation.zh: 等等 导演对这个方向有什么想法？

translation.en: He would've made a movie about my tuna fish sandwich.
translation.zh: 就算叫他就我的吞拿鱼三明治 拍一部电影 他也会愿意

translation.en: -[narrator] The Tuna Fish Murders? -He just wanted to make a movie.
translation.zh: 《吞拿鱼三明治杀手》？ 他只想拍电影

translation.en: [narrator] Ideally, not about tuna.
translation.zh: 还是别拍吞拿鱼的电影较好

translation.en: Oh, but it wasn't quite that easy.
translation.zh: 只是事情并没有那么顺利

translation.en: John Carpenter did have a couple of demands.
translation.zh: 约翰卡朋特的确有几个要求

translation.en: John says he wants $10,000.
translation.zh: 约翰说他要一万美元酬劳

translation.en: [narrator] As just a deposit or something?
translation.zh: 只是定金吗？

translation.en: Now this is, direct, write, do the music, everything.
translation.zh: 包揽执导、编剧、配乐等所有工作

translation.en: [narrator] And his next request…
translation.zh: 他的第二个要求是…

translation.en: John asked if Debra Hill could produce the movie.
translation.zh: 约翰要求让黛布拉希尔来担任监制

translation.en: [narrator] Because since Assault on Precinct 13…
translation.zh: 因为两人 自合作《血溅13号警署》后

translation.en: She and John got to know each other much better.
translation.zh: 对彼此有了更深层、更多的理解

translation.en: -They were together. -[narrator] Professionally and personally.
translation.zh: 他们在一起了 是公是私都在一起了

translation.en: I said, "Sure, she can produce, if you think she's up to it, go ahead."
translation.zh: 我说：“没问题 如果你认为她做得到 那就让她担任监制”

translation.en: [narrator] But there was one last thing.
translation.zh: 但还有最后一个要求…

translation.en: He said to me, "Can I have my name above the title?"
translation.zh: 他跟我说： “可以把我的名字打在片名上吗？”

translation.en: Which I thought was a hell of a request from a novice filmmaker.
translation.zh: 我认为他是个菜鸟电影人 提出这种要求简直是狮子开大口

translation.en: And I remember what I said to him.
translation.zh: 我记得我当时这么回应

translation.en: "If you can do this movie for $300,000 the way I like it,
translation.zh: “假如你能用三十万完成这部电影 还能让我满意

translation.en: you can have anything you want."
translation.zh: 你想要什么都可以”

translation.en: [narrator] Except a free lunch, because for all Irwin's promises…
translation.zh: 除了请他吃午餐之外 因为尽管欧文信誓旦旦…

translation.en: I didn't have the 300,000.
translation.zh: 我当时并没有三十万美元

translation.en: [narrator] Well, maybe this guy did.
translation.zh: 也许这个家伙有这笔钱呢

translation.en: Moustapha Akkad,
translation.zh: 穆斯塔法阿凯德

translation.en: a moviemaker who, at this point, had joined forces with Irwin.
translation.zh: 一个刚加入欧文团队的电影人

translation.en: -We became fifty-fifty partners. -[narrator] Fifty-fifty?
translation.zh: 我们成了五五分伙伴 五五分？

translation.en: Actually, he got 51 percent.
translation.zh: 好吧 他六分

translation.en: -[narrator] Of course, because? -Oh, he had access to a lot of money.
translation.zh: 还用说吗？那是因为… 因为他手头上有大量的资金

translation.en: [narrator] But Moustapha wasn't exactly an open checkbook.
translation.zh: 但穆斯塔法也不是万能支票

translation.en: Based in London, Halloween wasn't exactly his cup of tea.
translation.zh: 来自伦敦的穆斯塔法阿凯德认为 《月光光心慌慌》并不是他的菜

translation.en: Moustapha said, "I worry when a movie is too much money."
translation.zh: 穆斯塔法说： “电影成本这么高 我不放心”

translation.en: I said, "Moustapha, if $300,000 is too much,
translation.zh: 我说：“穆斯塔法 如果你嫌三十万美元太多

translation.en: we'll skip it. We won't make the movie."
translation.zh: 那就算了 这部电影我们不拍”

translation.en: "Oh, no, no, no, no." His pride.
translation.zh: “我不是那个意思” 他的自尊心作祟

translation.en: -[narrator] And just like that… -He agreed to the 300,000.
translation.zh: 就这样… 他答应出资三十万美元

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: [narrator] Three hundred thousand.
translation.zh: 三十万美元

translation.en: Not to burst the bubble, but it really wasn't a lot of money
translation.zh: 不是想泼你们冷水 但比起那个年代的电影

translation.en: compared to movies of the day.
translation.zh: 三十万资金确实不算多

translation.en: Nevertheless, it was time to kick this low-budget movie into high gear,
translation.zh: 无论如何 这部低成本电影 必须马上投入制作

translation.en: beginning with the script,
translation.zh: 先从写剧本开始

translation.en: which John Carpenter wrote with Debra Hill.
translation.zh: 剧本由约翰卡朋特和黛布拉希尔 共同编写

translation.en: [Turek] The heart and soul of Halloween is John and Debra.
translation.zh: 约翰和黛布拉 是《月光光心慌慌》的灵魂人物

translation.en: Halloween was originally written by Debra Hill,
translation.zh: 剧本最初由黛布拉希尔完成

translation.en: and then John came in and layered in the mythology of…
translation.zh: 约翰加入后 融入了一些猎奇元素

translation.en: Evil.
translation.zh: 魔鬼

translation.en: You know, the nature of evil, how you can't kill evil.
translation.zh: 魔鬼的特征就是杀不死

translation.en: The blackest eyes. The devil's eyes.
translation.zh: 最黑暗的眼睛 有如魔鬼的眼睛

translation.en: It also didn't stretch too far beyond a relatable domestic experience.
translation.zh: 同时也保留了 某种贴切的日常体验

translation.en: The fact that this could happen to anyone, anywhere.
translation.zh: 让人觉得这事能发生在任何人身上 发生在任何地点

translation.en: It's a normal town.
translation.zh: 那是个平凡的小镇

translation.en: [Wallace] John knew absolutely what he was doing
translation.zh: 约翰很清楚自己在做什么 很清楚要玩什么花样

translation.en: and all the tricks that go with creating an atmosphere of unease.
translation.zh: 约翰很清楚自己在做什么 很清楚要玩什么花样 来打造紧张氛围

translation.en: But it was Debra who basically shaped Laurie, her friends.
translation.zh: 但洛莉和几个闺蜜的人设 乃是出自黛布拉的手笔

translation.en: -You totally never showed. -That's not true. Here I am.
translation.zh: 你从来没出现过 胡说 我这不是来了吗？

translation.en: -[narrator] About two weeks later… -They presented me with a first draft,
translation.zh: 大概两周后 他们把初稿交给我 当下就定案了

translation.en: and that was it.
translation.zh: 他们把初稿交给我 当下就定案了

translation.en: [narrator] And as casting began,
translation.zh: 选角工作开始

translation.en: John Carpenter and Debra Hill began considering
translation.zh: 约翰卡朋特和黛布拉希尔先要想好

translation.en: who their murderous Michael Myers would be.
translation.zh: 让谁来出演杀人魔麦克梅尔斯

translation.en: "My name is Michael Myers."
translation.zh: “我叫麦克梅尔斯”

translation.en: [narrator] As a thank you for giving Carpenter a start with Assault on Precinct 13.
translation.zh: 为了感谢他捧红 《血溅13号警署》的导演卡朋特…

translation.en: His wife was upset for years, because they had no participation in the movie.
translation.zh: 他太太因没受邀参与这部电影 而赌气了好几年

translation.en: She felt they were owed something.
translation.zh: 她觉得我们欠了他们人情

translation.en: [narrator] Bit awkward. But, anyway, the character did have another name.
translation.zh: 有点尴尬 但话说回来 这个角色有另一个绰号

translation.en: -The Shape. -[narrator] Yes, The Shape.
translation.zh: 叫“面具杀人魔” 没错 面具杀人魔

translation.en: There's very little mention of him as Michael Myers in the script.
translation.zh: 剧本中很少提到他的本名麦克梅尔斯

translation.en: He was always The Shape.
translation.zh: 只管他叫“面具杀人魔”

translation.en: [narrator] Well, anyway, they'd come back to that one.
translation.zh: 这点待会儿再回来处理

translation.en: But in the meantime, John and Debra focused on casting Dr. Samuel Loomis.
translation.zh: 与此同时 约翰和黛布拉把心力放在 挑选出演山姆鲁米斯医生的演员上

translation.en: Johnny came to me and wanted Christopher Lee.
translation.zh: 约翰跟我说他想找克里斯托弗李出演

translation.en: [narrator] Ah, Christopher Lee. Prestigious, seasoned and even bloodthirsty.
translation.zh: 克里斯托弗李 德高望重、经验老道 甚至嗜血如命

translation.en: [announcer] Count Dracula.
translation.zh: 德古拉伯爵

translation.en: [narrator] But despite his unquenchable bloodlust…
translation.zh: 虽然克里斯托弗李 难以抑制其对血的渴望…

translation.en: Christopher Lee turned it down.
translation.zh: 克里斯托弗李拒演

translation.en: [gasps] Take it away!
translation.zh: 拿走！

translation.en: [narrator] Just as well for Irwin, because…
translation.zh: 欧文也认为不合适

translation.en: -I had seen a movie called Will Penny. -[announcer] Starring Charlton Heston.
translation.zh: 我看过一部叫《五狱英雄》的电影 男主角是查尔顿赫斯顿

translation.en: [narrator] And while Charlton Heston's unyielding dispersal of pain was rather terrifying…
translation.zh: 查尔顿赫斯顿 在片中行使的暴力令人心惊胆颤

translation.en: …it was another performance in this 1968 Western
translation.zh: 但这部1968年的西部片有一场戏

translation.en: in which Irwin saw a potential for Halloween.
translation.zh: 让欧文留意到一个 适合演出《月光光心慌慌》的人选

translation.en: -Merry Christmas. -[narrator] Well, close enough.
translation.zh: 圣诞节快乐 圣诞节和万圣节差不多

translation.en: Donald Pleasence had played the insane patriarch of a bunch of crazy brigands.
translation.zh: 唐纳德普利森斯在片中 饰演一群凶猛土匪的头子

translation.en: -You ain't seen the last of me! -[narrator] And he's not wrong.
translation.zh: 你还没见识到我的绝招！ 他说得没错

translation.en: In fact, this seasoned star of stage and screen

translation.zh: 另一个参演的大咖演员 也有不一样的想法

translation.en: He was kind of annoyed that he had to be in this movie.
translation.zh: 他对自己必须参演的这部电影 感到不高兴

translation.en: In other words, I think the script is a bit overwritten.
translation.zh: 说白了 就是我觉得剧情太拖沓

translation.en: That's-- I don't know, it's difficult to find an expression other than that.
translation.zh: 我也说不上来 很难确切地形容出来

translation.en: [narrator] But any misgivings Pleasence had over the role didn't show.
translation.zh: 但唐纳德普利森斯对剧本的疑惑 并没有体现在他的演出上

translation.en: He was a good actor after all. He handled it like a pro.
translation.zh: 毕竟人家是好演员 是情绪管理高手

translation.en: He was drinking a lot of wine.
translation.zh: 他当时喝了很多红酒吧

translation.en: -[sighs] Yeah. -Are you all right?
translation.zh: -你还好吧？ -我没事

translation.en: [narrator] Well, it's a good thing he wasn't driving.
translation.zh: 好在当时开车的人不是他

translation.en: The night that we were out in the rainstorm,
translation.zh: 那晚的外景是在大雨下拍摄的

translation.en: he had a bottle or two of red wine in his trailer.
translation.zh: 他在房车里灌了一两瓶红酒

translation.en: I was worried that he wasn't even gonna be able to walk down the steps.
translation.zh: 我还担心他下不了台阶呢

translation.en: It was a very difficult scene, because all those people were out
translation.zh: 那是一场非常有挑战性的戏 讲述所有疯人院的病患

translation.en: and walking around in their robes, all the people from the sanitarium.
translation.zh: 都逃了出来 穿着病袍走来走去

translation.en: [narrator] And for Donald Pleasence's character, actually a really important scene.
translation.zh: 对唐纳德普利森斯所饰演的角色而言 那是一场重头戏

translation.en: And he had in-the-car dialogue with that nurse, and it had to be coherent.
translation.zh: 他要拍摄一场在车内 跟女护士对话的戏 不能出岔子

translation.en: You haven't anything to worry about.
translation.zh: 你不需要担心什么

translation.en: [narrator] Uh, no, John Carpenter had plenty to worry about.
translation.zh: 约翰卡朋特要担心的问题可多了

translation.en: Donald Pleasence just opened up on John.
translation.zh: 唐纳德普利森斯向约翰吐苦水

translation.en: "You're making me look like an ass."
translation.zh: “你把我整得像个傻子似的”

translation.en: It's a little melodramatic.
translation.zh: 有点伤感

translation.en: [narrator] And there, with his entire crew watching,
translation.zh: 在整个剧组众目睽睽下

translation.en: and his star two bottles of red wine in,
translation.zh: 两瓶红酒下肚的演员闹脾气

translation.en: the novice director was put to the test.
translation.zh: 这位菜鸟导演立刻受到了考验

translation.en: John was beyond his years in terms of his ability to handle people and handle situations.
translation.zh: 在处理人际关系和危机上 约翰有超乎年龄的实力

translation.en: [narrator] And that night, he handled Donald Pleasence.
translation.zh: 那个晚上 他成功摆平了唐纳德普利森斯

translation.en: Wait.
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: [narrator] During a scene when sobering coherency was, well, key.
translation.zh: 有一场戏要他从头到尾保持清醒

translation.en: And it was totally coherent, even though he was…
translation.zh: 他闹情绪的表现竟然跟剧情吻合 即便他当时其实是要…

translation.en: [narrator] In a rush to get back to his trailer?
translation.zh: 赶着回到房车上？

translation.en: While the angry yet oddly coherent words of Donald Pleasence cut like a knife,
translation.zh: 虽然唐纳德普利森斯的气话 离奇地跟剧情吻合 但也如刀刺耳

translation.en: the next challenge of the night involved a blunt instrument.
translation.zh: 剧组当晚接着要面对的另一个挑战 却跟利器无关

translation.en: Yeah, the window was tough to break.
translation.zh: 是啊 那扇窗不容易砸碎

translation.en: [narrator] But, as the movie's art director, Tommy Lee Wallace knew what to do.
translation.zh: 作为这部电影的美术总监 汤米李华莱士知道能怎么做

translation.en: He's up on top of the roof of the station wagon and, bam!
translation.zh: 他爬到旅行车顶上 砰地一声！

translation.en: If you look, you can see the wrench right here.
translation.zh: 看清楚的话 就能看见扳手

translation.en: Taped with flesh-colored tape. You can just see it.
translation.zh: 扳手用接近肤色的胶带固定 肉眼看得到

translation.en: [narrator] After a grueling shoot…
translation.zh: 拍摄玩那场棘手的戏后…

translation.en: That was possibly the most difficult day of the entire shoot.
translation.zh: 那可能是拍得最棘手的一场戏

translation.en: …they prep themselves for more.
translation.zh: …他们要面临更多挑战

translation.en: And the worst was yet to come,
translation.zh: 但这还不是最糟糕的情况

translation.en: because Tommy Lee Wallace faced a… pumpkin shortage.
translation.zh: 最糟糕的情况是 汤米李华莱士闹南瓜荒

translation.en: Believe it or not, in California in the springtime,
translation.zh: 信不信由你 加州在春天的时候

translation.en: it's very hard to find pumpkins.
translation.zh: 很难找到南瓜

translation.en: We only had three pumpkins.
translation.zh: 剧组只有三个南瓜

translation.en: -[ding] -[narrator] There's one. -[ding] -There's two.
translation.zh: 一个 两个

translation.en: And there's…
translation.zh: 还有…

translation.en: -There's three. -Oh, God!
translation.zh: 三个 天啊

translation.en: John did it on take one.
translation.zh: 天啊 那场戏约翰只拍一次 就搞砸了一个南瓜

translation.en: [narrator] Well, worst case, Nick had experience puppeteering fruit and veg, so, you know.
translation.zh: 但还有什么情况 比尼克扮演蔬果还要来得更糟呢？

translation.en: For the rest of their pumpkin needs…
translation.zh: 为了应付南瓜荒

translation.en: We found some kind of South American gourd
translation.zh: 我们找来了一种南美的瓜类

translation.en: that was dark green, so, naturally… "Paint department!"
translation.zh: 外皮是墨绿色的 那这个活就交给上色部门了

translation.en: [narrator] Would that be you?
translation.zh: 不就是你吗 汤米？

translation.en: But pumpkins weren't the only thing this production was short on.
translation.zh: 南瓜不是剧组唯一缺少的道具

translation.en: I just kept wondering, "Where's the blood? Where's the blood?"
translation.zh: 我一直好奇想知道 血呢？

translation.en: It didn't need blood.
translation.zh: 这部电影不需要血

translation.en: [narrator] Because true to Irwin's original direction…
translation.zh: 为了忠于欧文原来的方向…

translation.en: Theater of the mind.
translation.zh: 激发想象力的电影

translation.en: …John Carpenter was drawing from earlier master of suspense, Alfred Hitchcock.
translation.zh: 约翰卡朋特必须向悬疑片大师 阿尔弗雷德希区柯克汲取灵感

translation.en: It's like Psycho. You never see the knife hit Janet Leigh.
translation.zh: 就像《惊魂记》 观众没看到珍妮特利被刀插入的画面

translation.en: As a viewer, you were able to use your imagination more
translation.zh: 留给观众更大的想象空间

translation.en: and it makes it more horrifying to imagine
translation.zh: 看到安妮在车窗另一端遭到杀害时

translation.en: what happens the other side of the window when Annie's being killed in the car.
translation.zh: 观众想象起来会感到更加恐怖

translation.en: [narrator] But more than just leaving things to the imagination…
translation.zh: 除了给观众想象空间…

translation.en: Carpenter was going for something that was a little bit more nuanced.
translation.zh: 卡朋特想拍一些更讲究细节的镜头

translation.en: -[whimpers] -[narrator] And here's a good example.
translation.zh: 这是个好例子

translation.en: There's a scene in the film where Jamie Lee is at the top of the stairs…
translation.zh: 片中有一幕讲述杰米李站在楼梯上…

translation.en: And there's a shadowy area.
translation.zh: 画面中有个阴影区

translation.en: [Castle] Which John uses that empty space as like, what's there?
translation.zh: 约翰就利用那个空间 让观众好奇阴影里藏着什么

translation.en: -[narrator] Well, Nick was there. -Hi.
translation.zh: -尼克藏在那边 -大家好

translation.en: He was everywhere.
translation.zh: 他无所不在

translation.en: [Cundey] John said, "How can we make Michael Myers sort of appear?"
translation.zh: 约翰问： “我们要怎么让麦克梅尔斯现身？”

translation.en: [narrator] There in the dark? Well, the answer was…
translation.zh: 从黑暗里现身？解决方案是…

translation.en: By using lighting.
translation.zh: 利用灯光

translation.en: [Cundey] And I said, "How about if we put it on a dimmer and we'll have a light on his face?"
translation.zh: 于是我建议：“不如我们采用调光器 在他脸上打光？”

translation.en: And I wanted the audience to feel like their eyes are getting used to the dark.
translation.zh: 我要让观众以为 他们的眼睛已经适应了黑暗

translation.en: And the light comes up.
translation.zh: 灯光打下来

translation.en: And that's when I realized…
translation.zh: 那一刻 我才意识到

translation.en: "God, this is real scary shit."
translation.zh: “天啊 太恐怖了”

translation.en: -[rips] -[narrator] Oh! The stabbing.
translation.zh: 糟糕 被刺伤了

translation.en: -I had the blood, if they needed it. -[narrator] They didn't.
translation.zh: 剧组需要血的话 我有道具 他们不需要

translation.en: -[screams] -And when it came to Jamie Lee Curtis…
translation.zh: 说到杰米李柯蒂斯

translation.en: the crew found themselves falling for her.
translation.zh: 剧组里没人不喜欢她

translation.en: It was fun acting with Jamie.
translation.zh: 跟杰米一起演戏很好玩

translation.en: [narrator] Hang on, "acting?" Isn't Tommy the art director?
translation.zh: 等一下 你说“演戏”？ 汤米不是美术总监吗？

translation.en: [laughing] We only had money for one of these fake doors.
translation.zh: 剧组只有一扇假门的预算

translation.en: And he said, "I'd better do it because if I screw up, then, yeah, it's my fault."
translation.zh: 汤米跟我说：“让我来敲破吧 如果我搞砸的话 起码黑锅我来背

translation.en: "I don't want you to screw up." And you know, then I-- Ah.
translation.zh: 我不希望你搞砸了 我听了莫名其妙”

translation.en: Look in there and do The Shape. Yeah, that was fun.
translation.zh: 扮演“面具杀人魔” 往衣柜里张望 对啊 非常好玩

translation.en: [narrator] And as for the lead actor…
translation.zh: 对女主角的看法…

translation.en: Jamie, from day one, was kind of the girl scout next door.
translation.zh: 杰米一来到剧组 就像一个邻家女孩一样

translation.en: She was just great.
translation.zh: 她非常亲切

translation.en: She loved the crew, she carried camera cases when she wasn't too busy
translation.zh: 她对剧组成员态度友爱 空闲时会帮忙搬动机箱 只要…

translation.en: doing her… day job, you might say.
translation.zh: 白天不会太忙 可以这么说吧

translation.en: [narrator] Day job or sometimes, night job.
translation.zh: 白天要忙 有时晚上也要忙

translation.en: But as production neared its end…
translation.zh: 拍摄接近尾声时…

translation.en: We had one day left to shoot.
translation.zh: 我们只剩一天拍摄

translation.en: …this one would be an all-night job.
translation.zh: 这要忙一整个晚上了

translation.en: And it all came down to one last shot.
translation.zh: 只剩最后一场戏

translation.en: Which, in itself, was a long shot in every way.
translation.zh: 这场戏是个长镜头 这点跑不掉 说得确切点 是个很长的镜头

translation.en: Eh… just to be clear, it was really long.
translation.zh: 这点跑不掉 说得确切点 是个很长的镜头

translation.en: And he said, "We want to walk up to the house."
translation.zh: 约翰说：“我们走进屋里”

translation.en: Move up, around to the side, look through the window.
translation.zh: 走上台阶 从窗户望进去

translation.en: -There's the couple there. -Michael's around someplace.
translation.zh: 屋里有一对情侣 麦克在屋里呢

translation.en: [Cundey] We look at the window, the light goes out.
translation.zh: 抬头望向窗户 灯熄了

translation.en: -[music sting] -And as he described it, we would walk it.
translation.zh: 他边指导 我们边走

translation.en: [narrator] But as they walked it,
translation.zh: 边走边拍

translation.en: the challenges they'd face pulling this shot off
translation.zh: 拍好这场戏的挑战

translation.en: became more and more apparent.
translation.zh: 也变得越来越严峻

translation.en: In the film, the house is in good shape at the beginning and deteriorates.
translation.zh: 电影开端 房子状态良好 后来房子衰坏了

translation.en: -[Loomis] Anybody live here? -Not since 1963 when it happened.
translation.zh: 有人住吗？ 1963年出事后就空置至今

translation.en: But we shot in reverse.
translation.zh: 但拍摄顺序是相反的

translation.en: We shot all the deteriorated stuff and then just painted what we would see.
translation.zh: 我们先拍好房子衰坏的场景 再把房子粉刷成片中看到的场景

translation.en: Low-budget filmmaking at its finest.
translation.zh: 这是最出色的低成本拍摄手法

translation.en: [narrator] And one of the reasons that budget was so low
translation.zh: 成本之所以这么低

translation.en: was because of that fancy Panaglide contraption
translation.zh: 是因为经费都用在 高端的潘纳格莱摄影机稳定器上

translation.en: that Dean Cundey was expected to lug about for this epic shot.
translation.zh: 迪恩康恩指望这项技术 能拍摄出这个经典的画面

translation.en: It gives you a great deal more flexibility of how you can move the camera.
translation.zh: 稳定器让运镜手法更加灵活

translation.en: [narrator] But it also gives you a much smaller film magazine,
translation.zh: 只是胶片匣也比一般来得小 片长只有4分钟26秒

translation.en: limiting their takes to four minutes and 26 seconds.
translation.zh: 片长只有4分钟26秒

translation.en: [Mathis] Somebody was timing it as they were practicing,
translation.zh: 我们在练习时 叫一个人负责计时

translation.en: and it was clear that we weren't going to get the whole shot.
translation.zh: 显然做不到一镜到底

translation.en: Oh, terrific.
translation.zh: 这下可好了

translation.en: Debra jumped in and said, "Well, we need a cut point."
translation.zh: 黛布拉介入说：“我们需要找出切点”

translation.en: It was a lot of fun to devise that.
translation.zh: 策划过程非常有趣

translation.en: [narrator] And the solution?
translation.zh: 那你们有什么解决方案？

translation.en: [Cundey] We'll block the lens with a mask.
translation.zh: 我们用面具来挡住镜头

translation.en: We'll put the mask on in exactly the right spot for the eyes,
translation.zh: 把面具戴在眼睛的位置上

translation.en: and we'll continue the shot.
translation.zh: 然后继续拍摄

translation.en: [narrator] And so, after the first take,
translation.zh: 第一次拍完后

translation.en: they did another take,
translation.zh: 再拍第二次

translation.en: and then another one.
translation.zh: 再拍第三次

translation.en: A lot more takes.
translation.zh: 拍了好几次

translation.en: Reset everything, get it going, so we could do another take.
translation.zh: 重建场景 继续拍 再拍一次

translation.en: "Move this couch. It was in the way of going up the stairs,
translation.zh: “把沙发移开 沙发挡住了上楼的方向

translation.en: but we wanna see it coming down. Move the lights."
translation.zh: 镜头要往下移了 赶紧把灯光移走”

translation.en: And so you'd see people jumping out of windows,
translation.zh: 于是我们会看到有人从窗口跳下来

translation.en: and standing on balconies with their lights.
translation.zh: 或是手握灯光站在阳台上

translation.en: I was there with a bucket of blood.
translation.zh: 我站在一边 手里拿着一桶血

translation.en: -[screams] -[narrator] Now there's blood.
translation.zh: 好了 有血了

translation.en: With crew dangling from balconies and doing anything to clear the shot,
translation.zh: 有些剧组成员挂在栏杆上 竭尽所能清除所有拍摄障碍

translation.en: they did a lot of takes.
translation.zh: 这场戏拍了很多次

translation.en: Did over 20. We wore Ray Stella out. Dean put the rig on. We wore Dean out.
translation.zh: 这场戏拍了20次 我们累坏了雷斯黛拉 迪恩装上摄影机稳定器 也被我们累坏了

translation.en: We just kept doing it, the same shot over and over and over and over.
translation.zh: 这场戏不断重拍一次又一次

translation.en: I'm convinced that if it was still night, we'd still be shooting.
translation.zh: 我敢肯定 只要天还没亮 我们就会持续拍摄

translation.en: [narrator] But of course, the sun did eventually rise
translation.zh: 当然太阳终究还是会升起

translation.en: -on a very exhausted but happy crew. -[groans]
translation.zh: 阳光照在精疲力尽 却满心欢喜的剧组成员上

translation.en: I'm very tired, but I can see that this is going to be
translation.zh: 我累坏了 但我可以预见 这场戏将成为这部电影的亮点

translation.en: a significant moment for the film.
translation.zh: 但我可以预见 这场戏将成为这部电影的亮点

translation.en: [narrator] The revolutionary Panaglide camera rig
translation.zh: 这个前瞻性的潘纳格莱摄影机稳定器

translation.en: proved well worth its steep share of the budget.
translation.zh: 证明了当初花大手笔采购的决定值了

translation.en: [Rick Wallace] Each take was gold. It was this thrust for 15 or 16 hours.
translation.zh: 每个镜头都十分到位 而且是在十五六小时 不间断的操作下完成

translation.en: Nobody thought about whether we were tired or whether we weren't tired.
translation.zh: 完全没人意识到自己累不累

translation.en: We were just resetting and going again.
translation.zh: 我们只顾着重建场景和重拍

translation.en: It was actually a beautiful way to end the film.
translation.zh: 以这种方式杀青也太好了

translation.en: [narrator] And with that…
translation.zh: 拍好后…

translation.en: John turned to everybody and said, "I got my shot."
translation.zh: 约翰转过头来 跟大伙儿说： “拍到我要的戏了”

translation.en: …Halloween finished shooting.
translation.zh: 《月光光心慌慌》杀青了

translation.en: Right, then. Time for editing.
translation.zh: 如今来到了剪辑的部分

translation.en: And to do that, they brought in a serious--
translation.zh: 为了剪好片子 剧组请来了不苟言笑的…

translation.en: -Hello. -Oh, it's just-- Tommy just did it.
translation.zh: 其实就是汤米 汤米自己说了

translation.en: Along with assistance from Charles Bornstein.
translation.zh: 还请来了查尔斯伯恩斯坦从旁协助

translation.en: And together, the two refined the film's dreadful pacing.
translation.zh: 两人联手让原本拖沓的剧情 变得更加紧凑

translation.en: Oh, in a good way.
translation.zh: 也就是让电影更好看

translation.en: Tommy and John always likened it to a rubber band.
translation.zh: 汤米和约翰经常把剧情形容成橡胶圈

translation.en: How far could you stretch the rubber band…
translation.zh: 橡胶圈要拉得多紧…

translation.en: …before you knew it was going to snap?
translation.zh: 才会断掉？

translation.en: And it's just about stretching things out
translation.zh: 重点是要把节奏变得更紧凑

translation.en: to make it so that when you know that something horrible is gonna happen…
translation.zh: 让观众意识到即将发生恐怖的事

translation.en: it creates this horrible dread, and you just want it to be over.
translation.zh: 使人产生一种窒息的恐惧感 希望这一幕赶紧结束

translation.en: [narrator] They even found a way to stretch that dread…
translation.zh: 剧组甚至找到办法 把这份恐惧感延伸到…

translation.en: past the ending of the film.
translation.zh: 电影结束后

translation.en: How about having them go out of the theater
translation.zh: 不如这样吧 我们让观众走出电影院后

translation.en: dreading to go to their car, because that empty street
translation.zh: 紧张兮兮地冲上车 因为他们总觉得空荡荡的街道上

translation.en: could have the boogeyman hiding behind a telephone pole or something?
translation.zh: 有个杀人魔潜伏在电话亭后面

translation.en: [narrator] Or the bushes. He does seem to like the bushes.
translation.zh: 或是藏在灌木丛里 他似乎喜欢藏在灌木丛里
